channel.title: The Hearts of Wulin page is now live!
channel.description:
The Hearts of Wulin info page is now live on the webstite! Head over there and take a look if you get a chance. You can join the mailing list to be notified when the KS goes live, learn a bit more about the game (for those of you who have yet to play it), find media resources, and learn about our lovely team (@Agatha @edige23 and @Blue_troller). There is also a link to a special thread on The Gauntlet Forums about the game. If you have played the game or read any materials for it, we’d love it if you’d head over there and give some feedback.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/hearts-of-wulin.html
![32%20PM|327x500](upload://fP7XFFDaVbwHptgtbDXoWsJs9V7.jpeg)

This is great — can’t wait for the Kickstarter!

item.title: The Hearts of Wulin page is now live!
item.dc:creator: @jasoncordova
item.description:
@jasoncordova wrote:

The Hearts of Wulin info page is now live on the webstite! Head over there and take a look if you get a chance. You can join the mailing list to be notified when the KS goes live, learn a bit more about the game (for those of you who have yet to play it), find media resources, and learn about our lovely team (@Agatha @edige23 and @Blue_troller). There is also a link to a special thread on The Gauntlet Forums about the game. If you have played the game or read any materials for it, we’d love it if you’d head over there and give some feedback.

THE GAUNTLET

Hearts of Wulin

Hearts of Wulin is a roleplaying game of wuxia melodrama. P layers take the role of skilled martial artists in a world of rival clans, conspiracies, and obligations. The game builds on the Apocalypse...

32%20PM896×1366 810 KB
